structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

law.catch_line: Fiscal court may make cooperative agreement.
law.text: Nothing in KRS 177.9771 to 177.981 shall be construed as prohibiting a county fiscal court from entering into a cooperative agreement.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 373, sec. 10, effective July 13, 1984.
